posts.post_title: N28 Anson and Bennett for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Glenn
Don,

I've already been outbid on the Bennett (I'm assuming the one on ebay is the same one you're offering here).  Do you still have the Anson?  What's your price?  Cash only or would you consider a trade?  I have several 1950's Mantle cards, both Bowman and Topps, all PSA graded.

Thanks,
Glenn Scheyd
